line.comment: * SWM3 Warlord Challenge makes all companies trade with everything
* Add wares depending on the company.
* We don't trade E-Cells because their RelVal is based upon another category of wares (imbalanced). Also added Waste.

sval.val: SWM3 Warlord Challenge makes all companies trade with everything
Add wares depending on the company.
We don't trade E-Cells because their RelVal is based upon another category of wares (imbalanced). Also added Waste.
